function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of contagious diseases through data sharing and integration","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict data privacy guidelines and limited access to sensitive information","Technologies":"Encryption, access control, and secure data sharing platforms","People":"Researchers, data scientists, and anyone involved in data sharing","Owner":"Research institutions, data governance organizations"},{"Description":"Use of biomedical ontologies for studying coronavirus diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate or misleading conclusions drawn from data analysis","Mitigation":"Regular validation and verification of ontology data, collaboration with domain experts in epidemiology and infectious diseases","Technologies":"Data validation tools, expert consultation platforms","People":"Biomedical researchers, analysts, and ontology curators","Owner":"Biomedical institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of ontology openness and interoperability","Impact":"Limited data sharing and collaboration across different research domains","Mitigation":"Adoption of FAIR principles, standardization of ontology formats, and development of interoperable ontology systems","Technologies":"FAIR data principles, ontology format standards, interoperable data systems","People":"Data scientists, researchers, and ontology developers","Owner":"Data governance organizations, research institutions"}]}
